title: Sketchbook Folio, Small Study of Ocean and Decorative Sketch, 1870–85
title_raw: Small Study of Ocean and Decorative Sketch
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
dimensions:
Recto:  8.2 x 13.6 cm (3 1/4 x 5 3/8 in.), irregular
Verso: 9.2 x 12.6 cm (3 5/8 x 4 15/16 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.8 x 19.2 cm (5 1/16 x 7 9/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: On left of sheet, a small study of white-capped waves on the ocean. On right of the sheet a floral, decorative flourish.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, Small Study of Ocean and Decorative Sketch, 1870–85. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. 
Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-86-52
